alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 30 at 3:54PM PDT until May 01 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Death Valley National Park and the Western Mojave Desert including Barstow. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and result in brief power outages, driving may become hazardous for high profile vehicles, and periods of blowing dust could occur.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Western Mojave Desert
